016package de.cuioss.uimodel.model.code;
017
018import java.io.Serializable;
019import java.util.Locale;
020
021/**
022 * Abstracts any implementation of Code, CodeDto, CodedValueDto, AnnotatedCode
023 * etc.
024 * <p>
025 * The idea is use (resolve) any of this object without care about how the magic
026 * resolving is working. This approach provide a lose coupling from UI to BE.
027 * Additional advantage is the simple creation of mocks.
028 * </p>
029 * <p>
030 * <em>PRECONDITION</em> : appropriate use is only possible if you have
031 * knowledge about DAO pattern (data access object)
032 * </p>
033 * This interface doesn't make assumptions about the resolving strategies or
034 * caching feel free to use the power of this.
035 *
036 * @author Eugen Fischer
037 */
038public interface CodeType extends Serializable {
039
040    /**
041     * Provide translated value by using implementation defined resolving /
042     * fall-back logic.
043     *
044     * @param locale {@linkplain Locale} must not be null.
045     * @return resolved value if possible, {@code null} otherwise.
046     */
047    String getResolved(Locale locale);
048
049    /**
050     * @return unique id must be always defined
051     */
052    String getIdentifier();
053}
